p: The rheological properties of the flour were determined by farinograms obtained using a Brabender farinograph (300 g capacity, Duisburg, Germany) and performed according to the AACC International 54-21 method [ 12]. Alveograms were obtained using a Groupe Tripette and Renaud alveograph (Chopin, France) and according to AACC International 54-30 method [ 12]. All these tests were performed at MEJORPLUS Company laboratories (Puebla, Mexico).
